title: Ada Derana awarded most popular news bulletin at Raigam Tele’es
body_lines: Derana media network picked up multiple awards at the Raigam Tele’es 2020/2021 – The Nation’s Tele Awards.
Ada Derana bagged the award for the Most Popular News Bulletin of the year 2021.
Meanwhile Derana Dream Star won the award for the Most Creative Reality Programme of the Year.
The Grand Awards Ceremony was held at Shangri-La Hotel, Colombo with the winners for the year 2020 and 2021 awarded at the ceremony.
The 17th encounter of Raigam Tele’es was held combining the postponed event for 2020 with the event due for 2021.
